thread.title: Atalanta's Franck Kessie dreams of Man United wouldn't turn down Chelsea - ESPN FC
thread.title_full: Atalanta's Franck Kessie dreams of Man United wouldn't turn down Chelsea - ESPN FC

author: Glenn Price
title: Atalanta's Franck Kessie dreams of Man United wouldn't turn down Chelsea - ESPN FC
text:
Atalanta's Franck Kessie dreams of Man United, wouldn't reject Chelsea Franck Kessie spent last season on loan at Cesena in Serie B. 
Atalanta midfielder Franck Kessie insists that he would never turn down a move to Chelsea, but that he dreams of playing for Manchester United. 
Kessie, 20, has been linked with both clubs, as well as Arsenal, PSG and Roma, with Chelsea reportedly bidding â‚¬30 million for him in January. 
The Ivory Coast international midfielder was asked specifically about the interest of Roma at a meet and greet with fans at the Atalanta Store on Wednesday but revealed more about his future hopes. 
"I did not hear any rumours around Roma, as I was at the Africa Cup of Nations and so focused only on playing," Kessie told Tuttomercatoweb. 
"I like the Premier League and in particular Manchester United, the club I dream of playing for. 
"Chelsea? That is also a big club, nobody would turn them down, but I dream of United." 
Follow @ESPNFC on Twitter to keep up with the latest football updates.
